00030 namespace uStreamLib {
00044         class US_API_EXPORT PriorityQueue : public Queue {
00045         public:
00049                 enum PriorityID { PRI_OOB = -1, PRI_MAX = 0 };
00050 
00054                 PriorityQueue(void);
00055 
00059                 virtual ~PriorityQueue(void);
00060 
00064                 int32 init(char* name, uint32 max_item_size, int32 capacity,
00065                         int32 priority_levels, int32 oob_capacity = 10);
00066 
00067                 int32 get(char* item, uint32 size)
00068                 {
00069                         return _get(true, item, size);
00070                 }
00071 
00072                 int32 tryGet(char* item, uint32 size)
00073                 {
00074                         return _get(false, item, size);
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 int32 put(char* item, uint32 size, int32 priority);
00078                 int32 put(char* item, uint32 size)
00079                 {
00080                         return put(item, size, 0);
00081                 }
00082 
00083                 int32 tryPut(char* item, uint32 size, int32 priority);
00084                 int32 tryPut(char* item, uint32 size)
00085                 {
00086                         return tryPut(item, size, 0);
00087                 }
00088 
00089                 int32 getCount(void)
00090                 {
00091                         return _sem_item_count.getValue();
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 int32 getOOBCount(void)
00095                 {
00096                         return _oobq.getCount();
00097                 }
00098 
00099                 int32 getCountPerPriority(int32 priority);
00100                 int32 setDrawingRate(int32 pri, double rate);
00101                 double getDrawingRate(int32 pri);
00102 
00103         protected:
00104                 /* array of shared queues */
00105                 SharedQueue** _pq;
00106 
00107                 /* out of band queue */
00108                 SharedQueue _oobq;
00109 
00110                 /* number of priority levels */
00111                 int32 _priority_levels;
00112 
00113                 /* current queue priority to fetch from */
00114                 int32 _start;
00115 
00116                 /* drawing rates (anti starvation) */
00117                 double* _drawing_rate;
00118 
00119                 /* drawing thresholds */
00120                 int32* _threshold;
00121 
00122                 /* fetched elements counters */
00123                 int32* _items_drawn;
00124 
00125                 /* insert semaphore */
00126                 Semaphore _sem_item_count;
00127 
00128                 /* fetch semaphore */
00129                 Semaphore _sem_free_count;
00130 
00131                 /* consumer protection mutex */
00132                 Mutex _cmutex;
00133

00135                 // copy constructor not available

00137                 {
00138                 }
00139

00141                 int32 _get(bool blocking, char* data, uint32 size);
00142         };
